rows.label: qst701101_msg0001
rows.name:
Hello, young lady. The name's Arb,
and I'm a shipwright by trade. Though
currently in the midst of moving...

rows.label: qst701101_msg0002
rows.name:
Sorry to accost you, but do you know
much about ships? My apprentice could
use a hand with one he's making now.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0003
rows.name:
A ship, you say?
I have to say I haven't a clue, but we'd
love to help if we could...

rows.label: qst701101_msg0004
rows.name:
Hahah, you are as much a lifesaver as
people say, then. But tell me, what do
you expect from the future?

rows.label: qst701101_msg0005
rows.name:
Huh?
I, er, I haven't really given it much
thought... Why do you ask?

rows.label: qst701101_msg0006
rows.name:
Because a person's destiny can change,
depending on what they choose to
fixate on. What they choose to value.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0007
rows.name:
Uh... I'm not really sure where you're
going with this...

rows.label: qst701101_msg0008
rows.name:
You're suggesting that our compulsions
may do more than bring us happiness
or prosperity?

rows.label: qst701101_msg0009
rows.name:
If one were to be fixated on a remote
past which cannot be changed, what
a sad life they would lead...

rows.label: qst701101_msg0010
rows.name:
Their sadness would only beget
further sadness...

rows.label: qst701101_msg0011
rows.name:
Hohoho...
What a curious mind you have, sir.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0012
rows.name:
Where's this from all of a sudden?
I thought your head was full of Hugo,
Hugo, Hugo.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0013
rows.name:
Hrm. His Majesty is everything to me.
But that's subtly different from a
"compulsion"...

rows.label: qst701101_msg0014
rows.name:
That's right. I'd call it "devotion",
if I had to call it anything.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0015
rows.name:
I'd call it "overbearing", but to each
their own...

rows.label: qst701101_msg0017
rows.name:
Yes, well, in any case, I'm very curious
to see what fate has in store for you,
young lady...

rows.label: qst701101_msg0018
rows.name:
As for my apprentice, Wotta, he just
returned to the residential district.
Do pay him a visit if you're so inclined.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0019
rows.name:
But in the midst of that, you mustn't
forget whom you're helping, for what
cause, and where it may lead you...
